mapper.select: select O.*, P.patient_name, P.patient_birth, P.patient_gender, P.patient_blood, D.diagnosis_staff_id, D.diagnosis_title, D.diagnosis_date, R.operation_room_no, R.operation_state from operation O join operation_room R on O.operation_no = R.operation_origin_no join patient P on O.patient_no = P.patient_no join diagnosis D on O.operation_diagnosis_no = d.diagnosis_no
